title: My First Time: Anal... And More
description: Before college even began, I let my boyfriend Taran start exploring my ass. One night, I let him go all the way...These are the true stories of every one of my "first" sexual experiences... the first time I had sex, the first time I touched myself, the first time I was with a boy. They're my most intimate, passionate stories, and I'm excited to tell you every detail.
author: Riley Bryson
